bibl.title: Violence and Social Control in Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: The province did have a reputation as a violent place but this had, however, become a topos. Reality remains elusive.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists

bibl.seg: ALSTON Richard, Violence and Social Control in Roman Egypt.
Proceedings of the 20th International Congress of Papyrologists (Copenhagen, 1994) pp. 517-521.
The province did have a reputation as a violent place but this had, however, become a topos. Reality remains elusive.
